Your Wishlist

${{item.product_current_price}} ${{item.product_discount_price}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from 'src/app/data.types'; @Component({ selector: 'app-wishlist', templateUrl: './wishlist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./wishlist.component.css'] }) export class WishlistComponent { wishList: Product[] = []; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { const storedWishlist = localStorage.getItem('wishList'); if (storedWishlist) { this.wishList = JSON.parse(storedWishlist); } } }
